Detailed Description

Nanostack support applications.

Module includes Ping, Gateway disvover, Gateway advertisment... .

Function Documentation

ip_control_id_t parse_event_message (  buffer_t *  buf  ) 
 

Parse stack evet message.

Function parse stack event message and return event type.

Parameters:
buf pointer for stack event message
Returns:
BROKEN_LINK when packet transmission was failed to destination.

ROUTER_DISCOVER_RESPONSE GW-table updated by GW advertisment.

PENDING_TIMEOUT Indirect data send was not Polling from pending proxy.

TOO_LONG_PACKET application payload too long to send.

ASSOCIATION_WITH_COORDINATOR RFD device was complete assocation with Cordinator now RFD can send data.

ASSOCIATION_LOST Assocation to Cordinator losted

COORDINATOR_STARTED Cordinators network and MAC setups ready.

GATEWAY_STARTED Gateways network and MAC setups ready.

NOT_ASSOCIATED Error status when RFD device try to send data before assocation.

MAC_QUEUE_FULL MAC task message queue full then application shuold wait a while.

MAC_CCA_ERR Channel reserve fail and transmission fail also.

void push_to_app (  buffer_t *  buf  ) 
 

Stack event to APP.

Push stack event messges from stack to message queue.

portCHAR stack_service_init (  stack_event_t  stack_event,
sock_handler_func  stack_event_handler,
uint8_t  gateway_discover,
gateway_cache_t *  gw_table
) 
 

Stack service init.

Init stack event bus using message queue or callback function. Also init automatick GW tracking.

Parameters:
stack_event pointer for stack evet message queue, give NULL if want use function callback
stack_event_handler handler for stack event callback if want poll message queue give NULL
gateway_discover boolean value for GW tracking, 1 enable automatick tarcking then have to give pointer for GW-table
gw_table pointer to global GW-table to application, give NULL if
Returns:
pdFALSE service initialize fail

pdTRIE Initilize complete
